1.5.1 Record class

<coercion-policy>

Variable

Summary

Determines what data coercion is to be performed on a result set.

Signature

type-union(singleton($default-coercion), 
           singleton($no-coercion), 
           <sequence>, 
           <object>)

Library

sql

Module

sql

Description

Determines what data coercion is to be performed on a result set.
